name: Cisco | IOSXR | Network | OSPF | Neighbor Up (SYSLOG)
description: %ROUTING-OSPF-5-ADJCHG : Process 1, Nbr 172.18.244.46 on TenGigE0/0/1/0 in area 0 from LOADING to FULL, Loading Done, vrf shpd vrfid 0x60000003

patterns.value_re: %OSPF-5-ADJCHG: Process \d+, Nbr (?P<neighbor>\S+) on (?P<interface>.+) in area (?P<area>\d+) from (?P<from_state>LOADING) to (?P<to_state>FULL), Loading Done, vrf (?P<vrf>\S+)

name: Cisco | IOSXR | Network | OSPF | Neighbor Down (SYSLOG)
description: %ROUTING-OSPF-5-ADJCHG : Process 1, Nbr 172.18.244.46 on TenGigE0/0/1/0 in area 0 from FULL to DOWN, Neighbor Down: interface down or detached, vrf shpd vrfid 0x60000003

patterns.value_re: %OSPF-5-ADJCHG: Process \d+, Nbr (?P<neighbor>\S+) on (?P<interface>.+) in area (?P<area>\d+) from (?P<from_state>INIT|FULL|2WAY) to (?P<to_state>DOWN), Neighbor Down: (?P<reason>.+), vrf (?P<vrf>\S+)
